about_the_game:
A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, they go back to their dorm room with their dates after a night of clubbing.

GAME DESCRIPTION
College Sex is a visual novel series that follows the story of two attractive young women and their naughty experiences in college.
After a wild night of drinking and clubbing, Ivy and her boyfriend along with Jade and Nick return to their dorm room.
Still tipsy, the girls start making out passionately, much to the boys’ surprise.
Things get crazy when the four realize that jealousy is not a problem for any of them.
What follows next… we leave it to you to discover.
We promise you a steamy story with high-definitions graphics and realistic-looking characters.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains lesbian and straight sex scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
